title: HAHANet: Towards Accurate Image Classifiers with Less Parameters

publication.name: Pacific-Rim Symposium on Image and Video Technology (PSIVT)

description: We propose an efficient convolutional block which minimizes the computational requirements of a network. Our approach achieves state-of-the-art accuracy on several challenging fine-grained classification tasks. More importantly, HAHANet outperforms top networks while reducing parameter count by at most 54 times.
